content: rust goes green reusable cotton market bag by jill chatelain size 14 wide 15 tall materials sugar n cream worsted weight cotton 3 balls 375 yds total h 5 0mm crochet hook tapestry needle large button directions base make 46 st chain starting at 2nd chain from hook single_crochet across chain 45 single_crochet row 2-11 working back and forth work single_crochet row for 10 more row row 12 turn work across 44 single_crochet on 45th single_crochet work 3 single_crochet to turn corner single_crochet across end of row 10 single_crochet turn corner 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet across the beginning chain row to last chain 44st turn corner 3 single_crochet in last chain single_crochet across end of row 9 single_crochet turn corner 3sc connect to first single_crochet with slip_stitch 118 sts total row 13 repeat row 12 working each side to last single_crochet and work turn corner at each corner single_crochet 126 sts body row 1 chain 3 *skip 1 single_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet chain 1* repeat around join with slip_stitch to 2nd chain st 63 double_crochet including chain 3 at beginning row 2 19 slip_stitch in space before next double_crochet chain 3 *double_crochet in next ch1 space chain 1* repeat around join with slip_stitch to 2nd chain st note the beginning of each round will appear to travel diagonally up the bag as you crochet this is normal row 20 chain 1 work one single_crochet in each double_crochet and each chain of previous row join at end with slip_stitch in top of first single_crochet row 21 chain 2 work one double_crochet in each single_crochet of previous row join at end with slip_stitch to 2nd chain of beginning row 22 chain 1 work one single_crochet in each double_crochet of previous row join at end with slip_stitch in top of first single_crochet row 23 repeat row 1 row 24 repeat row 2 row 25 -27 repeat row 20 22 end handles make 2 make 71 st chain leave a long tail to use to sew handle to bag row 1 single_crochet into back loop of 2nd chain from hook repeat across chain 70 single_crochet turn row2 - 4 ch1 single_crochet into each single_crochet across end leaving a long tail to use to sew handle on bag note after several people have made this bag a few handle changes have been made above is the original pattern option #1 some people decided the handles are too long and the bag can drag on the ground when filled with items if you want a shorter handle make a chain of 51 sts instead of 71sts option #2 if you want to be able to carry the bag over your shoulder make longer handles start with a chain of 101 sts rust goes green jill chatelain 6/2008 rev 3/10 all rights reserved button loop make 20 st chain leave a long tail to use to sew loop to bag single_crochet into back loop of 2nd chain from hook repeat across chain 19 single_crochet
